Package org.owasp.validator.html

Class Summary
AntiSamy This is the only class from which the outside world should be calling.
CleanResults This class contains the results of a scan.
Policy Policy.java This file holds the model for our policy engine.
 

Exception Summary
PolicyException This exception gets thrown when there is a problem validating or parsing the policy file.
ScanException This exception gets thrown when there is an unexpected error parsing the tainted HTML.
